channel.title: [error] Connecting to server forever
channel.description:
I am trying to connect to my friends server but my jar client is just staying on the connnecting to world 1 screen. I deleted the cache like 5 times re installed his jar client and everything and I still cannot load. It does not even say error connecting to server it just stays connecting. It has been like this for 10 hours so far on the same screen.
I also know its online as my friends are currently playing it. Its not server sided its definitely my computer.
